attributes.action: Conservative government to apologise to Roger Scruton for unwarranted dismissal
attributes.background: One of Britain's great thinkers was removed from his advisory position owing to a mendacious piece of political journalism by the socialist George Eaton.  The government must issue Sir Roger a formal apology and carry out an investigation into his firing.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, including about decisions that have already been taken.
